comment.author: 28192603@N03
comment._content: Many of the carpenters who constructed and repair these homes were later commonly referred to as "Stormies," as a result of having learnt their trade on the job, after the passage of Janet. But never- the- less, these pre-fab homes were well built, with some surviving up to the mid 70's.These team of carpenters were under the direct supervision of Master Carpenters of the day.One of whom I recalled in the St Joseph area by the name of Sonny Marshall.
